main event: A white star-like object was observed flying over Red Feather Lakes, Colorado, for 15 minutes on May 8, 1964.
interesting points: The object exhibited a gradual decrease in intensity, fading at a 30-degree elevation., The direction of flight was not included in the observation., Only one object was reported during the sighting., The observation was classified as ground-visual., The sighting occurred at 10:30 AM local time.
